channel.title: How do I add ::yell (donator+)
channel.description: How do I add the command ::yell for donators, mods, admins, and owners. I tried it and it gave me an error. I'm using a PI source.

item.title: How do I add ::yell (donator+)
item.dc:creator: @24jared24 24jared24
item.description:
@24jared24 wrote:

In commands ofc,

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") && (c.playerRights >= 1)) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; if (c.isDonator >= 1 && c.playerRights == 0) { c2.sendMessage("[@or3@Donator@bla@] [" + c.playerName + "]: @or3@" + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))); } else if (c.playerRights == 4){ c2.sendMessage("[@or2@Donator@bla@] [" + c.playerName + "]: @or2@" + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))); } else if (c.playerRights == 1) { c2.sendMessage("[@mon@Moderator@bla@] [" + c.playerName + "]: @dbl@" + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))); } else if (c.playerRights == 2) { c2.sendMessage("[@yel@Admin@bla@] @yel@ [" + c.playerName + "]: @red@" + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))); } else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mentos")){ c2.sendMessage("@cr3@[@dre@Owner@bla@] @whi@ [" + c.playerName + "]: @dre@" + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))); } else if (c.playerRights == 3) { c2.sendMessage("@cr2@[@or3@Owner@bla@] [" + c.playerName + "]: @gre@" + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))); } } } }

Ofcourse, customize it, and what-not

Read full topic
